scripts.build:worker: cd ../worker && pnpm exec wrangler deploy --dry-run --outdir ../installer/.tmp-build && cp ../installer/.tmp-build/index.js ../installer/public/worker-bundle.js && cat ../worker/migrations/*.sql > ../installer/public/migrations.sql && cp -r ../worker/public/ ../installer/public/worker-assets/
scripts.build: pnpm run build:assets && pnpm run build:worker
scripts.deploy: pnpm run build && wrangler deploy --var BUILD_SHA:$(git rev-parse HEAD)
